name: Snowdrop
description: 595 financial modeling, compliance, DeFi, GCP, and infrastructure skills. ES256 JWT Bearer token required for premium tool access. Contact Thunder (Turner Peters, Stonewater Solutions LLC) for token issuance.

authentication.description: ES256 JWT signed by Snowdrop Core. Scope: 'premium:all' for full access, 'premium:skill:{tool_name}' for single-tool access. Token issuance is manual — contact provider.

skills.name: MCP Tool Access
skills.description: Access all 595 Snowdrop skills via the MCP tools/call protocol. Use tools/list to enumerate available skills.
examples: Calculate IRR for a set of cash flows
Run MiCA asset classification on a token
Send a Firebase Cloud Messaging notification
